title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News           The media play an important role in keeping the public informed about City of Rocks National Reserve Wallace Keck  Currently, the Reserve has one active News Release concerning a trail closure to protect nesting raptors. All roads and facilities are open. For the latest happenings, visit us on Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/CityOfRocksNationalReserve https://www.facebook.com/CastleRocksStatePark Media inquiries should be directed to: Wallace Keck,Superintendent Cityof Rocks National Reserve CastleRocks State Park POBox 169 (3035 Elba-Almo Rd); Almo, ID 83312 (208)824-5911 office (208)312-2796 cell e-mail us
